timeline.title: Class 10th Exams
timeline.description: Board exams are a major step towards your career. Stay focused and prepare well.

timeline.title: Stream Selection
timeline.description: Choose between Science, Commerce, and Arts based on your interests and goals.

timeline.title: Class 12th Exams
timeline.description: Your final board exams. High scores can open up better college opportunities.

timeline.title: JEE/NEET Entrance
timeline.description: Important entrance exams for aspiring engineers and doctors.

details.eligibility: Passed 12th class with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics/Biology.
details.syllabus: Based on 11th and 12th class NCERT syllabus. Focus on core concepts.
preparation: Focus on time management and speed.

timeline.title: UPSC CSE Prelims
timeline.description: Union Public Service Commission Civil Services Examination preliminary stage.

details.eligibility: Must hold a Bachelor's degree from a recognized university.
details.syllabus: General Studies (GS) and Civil Services Aptitude Test (CSAT).
preparation: Practice CSAT questions to improve aptitude.
Study key government reports and policies.

timeline.title: SSC CGL Tier 1
timeline.description: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Tier 1 exam.

details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree from a recognized university.
details.syllabus: General Intelligence & Reasoning, General Awareness, Quantitative Aptitude, English Comprehension.
preparation: Study General Awareness from reliable sources.
Practice a variety of questions from different topics.

timeline.title: IBPS PO Prelims
timeline.description: Institute of Banking Personnel Selection Probationary Officer preliminary exam.

details.eligibility: Graduate in any discipline from a recognized university.
details.syllabus: English Language, Quantitative Aptitude, and Reasoning Ability.
preparation: Solve mock tests under a time limit.
Read newspapers to improve English and General Awareness.

timeline.title: RRB NTPC CBT 1
timeline.description: Railway Recruitment Board Non-Technical Popular Categories computer-based test.

details.eligibility: 12th pass or equivalent for undergraduate posts; graduate degree for graduate posts.
details.syllabus: Mathematics, General Intelligence & Reasoning, General Awareness.
preparation: Focus on basic to intermediate math concepts.
Stay updated with recent events and news.
Practice logical reasoning puzzles and questions.

timeline.title: SSC CHSL Tier 1
timeline.description: Staff Selection Commission Combined Higher Secondary Level Tier 1 exam.

details.eligibility: 12th class or equivalent examination from a recognized board.
details.syllabus: English Language, General Intelligence, Quantitative Aptitude, and General Awareness.
preparation: Improve vocabulary for the English section.
Solve previous year's papers to understand the pattern.

timeline.title: SBI PO Prelims
timeline.description: State Bank of India Probationary Officer preliminary exam.

details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree from a recognized university.
details.syllabus: English Language, Quantitative Aptitude, and Reasoning Ability.
preparation: Attempt sectional and full-length mock tests.

timeline.title: LIC AAO Exam
timeline.description: Life Insurance Corporation of India Assistant Administrative Officer exam.

details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree from a recognized university.
details.syllabus: Reasoning Ability, Quantitative Aptitude, and English Language.
preparation: Stay updated on insurance sector news.

timeline.title: CTET Exam
timeline.description: Central Teacher Eligibility Test for teaching positions.

details.eligibility: Varies by post, generally a teaching diploma or degree is required.
details.syllabus: Child Development and Pedagogy, Language I & II, Mathematics, Environmental Studies.

timeline.title: AFCAT Exam
timeline.description: Air Force Common Admission Test for officers in the Indian Air Force.

details.eligibility: Graduation in any discipline for Flying Branch, specific degrees for Ground Duty.
details.syllabus: General Awareness, Verbal Ability, Numerical Ability, and Reasoning.
preparation: Stay updated on defense and security news.

timeline.title: NABARD Grade A
timeline.description: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development Grade A officer exam.

details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any subject from a recognized university.
details.syllabus: General Awareness, Economic & Social Issues, Agriculture & Rural Development.

notifications.title: UPSC CSE Prelims Application Window
notifications.message: The application window for UPSC Civil Services Prelims is now open! Apply before the last date.

notifications.title: Upcoming Webinar: Career in Government Sector
notifications.message: Join our live webinar with a senior government official this Saturday to learn more about a career in civil services.

notifications.title: SSC CGL Exam Date Announced
notifications.message: The official exam dates for SSC CGL Tier 1 have been announced. Check the official website for details.

notifications.title: Scholarship Alert!
notifications.message: The deadline for the National Talent Search Examination (NTSE) scholarship is approaching. Don't forget to submit your application.

notifications.title: New Blog Post: 'How to Choose the Right College'
notifications.message: Read our latest article that provides a step-by-step guide on selecting the best college for your career path.

notifications.title: Important: IBPS PO Prelims Admit Card
notifications.message: Your admit card for the IBPS PO preliminary exam is now available for download on the official portal.

searchable_content.title: JEE Main Exam
searchable_content.description: Joint Entrance Examination for admission to various undergraduate engineering courses.

searchable_content.title: NEET Application Form
searchable_content.description: National Eligibility cum Entrance Test for medical and dental courses.

searchable_content.title: CUET Exam
searchable_content.description: Common University Entrance Test for admission to central universities.

searchable_content.title: CLAT Application Form
searchable_content.description: Common Law Admission Test for law courses.

searchable_content.title: UPSC Civil Services Exam
searchable_content.description: Union Public Service Commission conducts this exam for recruitment to various Civil Services of the Government of India.

searchable_content.title: SSC CGL Exam
searchable_content.description: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam is for various Group 'B' and 'C' posts in ministries and departments of the Indian government.

searchable_content.title: IBPS PO Exam
searchable_content.description: Institute of Banking Personnel Selection Probationary Officer Exam for recruitment of officers in public sector banks.

searchable_content.title: RRB NTPC Exam
searchable_content.description: Railway Recruitment Board Non-Technical Popular Categories Exam for various posts in the Indian Railways.

searchable_content.title: SSC CHSL Exam
searchable_content.description: Staff Selection Commission Combined Higher Secondary Level Exam for data entry operator, LDC, and other posts.

searchable_content.title: SBI PO Exam
searchable_content.description: State Bank of India Probationary Officer Exam is for the selection of Probationary Officers in SBI branches across India.

searchable_content.title: LIC AAO Exam
searchable_content.description: Life Insurance Corporation of India Assistant Administrative Officer Exam for various posts in LIC.

searchable_content.title: CTET Exam
searchable_content.description: Central Teacher Eligibility Test is conducted to determine the eligibility for teachers for classes 1 to 8.

searchable_content.title: AFCAT Exam
searchable_content.description: Air Force Common Admission Test is for the recruitment of officers in flying and ground duty branches.

searchable_content.title: NABARD Grade A Exam
searchable_content.description: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development Grade A Exam for Assistant Manager posts.
